# [Interview #1048: WOR Signing Report - IronCaf, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1048#25)

#### Outis

If an Elantrian bonded to a Seon and traveled to Roshar, would that act as a Nahel bond?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It would act very very similarly, yes. But it would be likeâ€¦ it wouldn't necesarily do the exact same things. It would be treated the exact same way, but wouldn't grant the same powers.
